text: Hi Victor Ramos! Navigate to Conversations > Templates and click on the WhatsApp tab to send a WhatsApp message. Only pre-approved templates are available, and a contact must grant consent. Sending WhatsApp messages via workflow actions is only available in Marketing Hub and Service Hub Professional and Enterprise. For more information go through this URL - <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/inbox/customize-and-manage-whatsapp-message-templates>
